lead_paragraph: Drew Brees asserts that his contract talks with the Saints haven't hampered the club's ability to acquire top free agents this offseason because he is committed to negotiating an extension that would improve the Saints' financial flexibility.

headline.print_headline: Saints' Drew Brees: Pace of Contract Talks Not Hurting Team
headline.main: Saints' Drew Brees: Pace of Contract Talks Not Hurting Team

snippet: Drew Brees asserts that his contract talks with the Saints haven't hampered the club's ability to acquire top free agents this offseason because he is committed to negotiating an extension that would improve the Saints' financial flexibility....
